record.title: COMMITTEE ON FOREIGN RELATIONS RULES OF PROCEDURE

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, pursuant to the requirements of paragraph 2 of Senate rule XXVI, I ask to have printed in the RECORD the rules of the Committee on Foreign Relations for the 110th Congress adopted by the committee on March 6, 2007.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the material was ordered to be printed in the RECORD, as follows:
